short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if your favourite twitch streamers are online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track if your favourite Twitch streamers are online and get notified if one just went online.

INFO! You DO NOT need to log in or anything!

Hot to use:
Simply add any streamer you want by typing in his name or login.
If any streamer from your list is online extension icon will change to RED color.
If any streamer recently started streaming you will get windows notification.
When clicking on notification or live streamer from your list browser will automaticaly open new tab with the stream.

RECOMMENDED:
Turn on notifications on your PC.
PIN THE EXTENSION ICON so you can always see it.

This app uses free hosting.
